short_summary: CMI Instrument provide to the DND (who purchase instrument from Strategic Headquarters)* Canada is looking to procure 4 channel digital oscilloscopes for science research Mission. Currently, the SNU is using this equipment, but this will be returned following the CLIP transaction. The supplier will be responsible for removing any toxic materials before collection. The Purchaser will ensures that proposed equipment is compatible with the existing Cryogenic glove box and the associated equipment peripherals. The scope of work involves delivering 4 channel digital oscilloscope. No competition, one supplier will be selected for purchase. One supplier, Le Vortege Administrators have expressed interests, however only one supplier will be selected for purchase.br> Note: The indicitative delivery date for the required equipment Is 31st of March 2023.

full_summary:
===============

# Tender Notice

## Title
4 Channel Oscilloscope

## Reference Number
PW-23-01024312

## Publication Date
2023-02-01

## Tender Closing Date
2023-02-15 14:00:00

## Description

Tendering Procedure: Selective

The Department of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) has published this notice to invite pre-qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the procurement of a 4-channel oscilloscope.

Category: Electrical Hardware and Supplies (EXR104A)

 Quantity: 1

### Pre-Qualified Suppliers

Pre-qualified suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) in series E60HN-16ELEC with Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC) have been invited to submit a proposal. The SA Holders are:

* ANIXTER CANADA INC (E60HN-16ELEC/001/HN)
* GRAYBAR CANADA (E60HN-16ELEC/002/HN)
* NEDCO, DIVISION OF REXAL CANADA ELECTRICAL INC (E60HN-16ELEC/003/HN)
* GIMPEL ELECTRIC SUPPLY LTD (E60HN-16ELEC/006/HN)
* ...
* NOVAPEX TECHNOLOGIES INC (E60HN-16ELEC/036/HN)

### Requested Delivery Date

All goods must be delivered on or before March 31st, 2023.

### Inquiries

All technical and contractual inquiries should be submitted in writing to:

Samantha Amadio
ISED Contracting Authority
Email: [Samantha.Amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:Samantha.Amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 542-2505

Inquiries must be received at least 5 working days prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time for response.

### Evaluation Criteria

The supplier with the lowest evaluated price, who is a pre-qualified supplier and already holds a Supply Arrangement (SA) for the items mentioned, will be recommended for contract award.

**Trade Agreements**

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

**Kournistry**

Amount and further details can be seen in the document.pdf attached to the notice.
